title: BC Environment NLP Pipeline
desc: Developed a comprehensive NLP pipeline for processing scanned environmental PDFs at the Government of British Columbia. Implemented document classification using regex patterns and BERT models, built duplicate detection with ROUGE and RapidFuzz algorithms, and integrated local LLM fallbacks with Ollama for robust processing capabilities. The system demonstrates strong performance in text metadata extraction, reliably detects potential duplicates, and makes conservative but highly accurate positive releasability predictions.
impact: Delivers strong metadata extraction, comprehensive duplicate detection, and cautious but highly accurate positive releasability predictions

title: Lay Summarization Pipeline
desc: Built a modular biomedical lay-summarization system comparing zero-shot, few-shot, fine-tuned, and retrieval-augmented approaches. On limited hardware, abstract-only LLaMA2 provided the best overall balance of relevance and readability, while RAG improved factual grounding. The pipeline includes an evaluation harness for ROUGE, BLEU, BERTScore, FKGL, CLI, DCRS, and SummaC.
impact: Abstract-only LLaMA2 outperformed fine-tuned variants on limited hardware, and the RAG variant achieved the strongest factuality by SummaC

title: Agentic Moderation and Detoxification Pipeline
desc: Built an agentic workflow that routes each input through language detection, translation when needed, sentiment and toxicity classification, and conditional detoxification. The agent uses LangDetect for language ID, UBC NLP Toucan for translation, and IBM Granite for classification and rewriting. It returns rationales, structured outputs, and handles errors across modular stages with reproducible runs.
impact: Multilingual moderation agent. Sentiment accuracy 0.650. Detox quality 7.7 out of 10.

title: Movie Review Corpus and UI
desc: Created a comprehensive movie review corpus with custom annotation schema and an intuitive exploration interface. Developed comparison frameworks for GPT-style annotations against human labels, providing insights into AI-human annotation alignment. The system supports large-scale sentiment analysis research.
impact: Prototyped a sentiment analysis research tool.
